title: Ocean view house in Daly City near San Francisco State University
posting_body: Amazing and spectacular view of Pacific Ocean, Daly City and San Francisco Downtown from the house

Beautiful Ocean View House near San Francisco State University (SFSU), UCSF, Genentech, Amgen, Gilead, Illumina, Thermo Fisher and many other high-tech companies in Daly City, South San Francisco and San Francisco.
Single family town home with big living room, kitchen, bedrooms, bathrooms and huge walk-in closets as well as many cabinets
Enjoy the comfort of town houses away from the hustle and bustle of the city and still just 15 minutes to San Francisco Downtown and 5 minuets to Daly City Downtown
5 minutes to BART, freeways, and tech shuttles with ease and discover the best Daly City has to offer
Gated access with quiet and safe neighborhood.
Perfect location to raise your kids

This ideal urban hideaway is conveniently located near world-class dining, shopping, and daily necessities including Costco, Home Depot, Serramonte Mall, Sprout Supermarket, Habit Burger, Koi Palace Seafood Restaurant, Seton Hospital, Home Depot, Target, Bed Bath and Beyond, and more
